leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

queries: [WEB] metagenomics reads quality control tools github

tools.name: shark
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping-free read selection tool for RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: Shark is a mapping-free software designed to fish relevant reads in an RNA-Seq sample, optimizing the process of selecting specific sequences without full alignment.

tools.name: Arcadia-Science/metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for metagenomic QC and profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed for quality control, evaluation, and profiling of metagenomic samples, supporting both short-read and long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: SOAPnuke
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated quality control and preprocessing tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for integrated Quality Control and Preprocessing on FASTQ or BAM/CRAM files, developed by BGI. It performs filtering, trimming, and statistics generation for high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: Bowtie 2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and sensitive gapped read aligner
tools.detailed_description: Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences. It supports gapped alignment and is widely used in NGS workflows.

tools.name: GateKeeper
tools.one_line_profile: FPGA-accelerated pre-alignment filter for DNA short reads
tools.detailed_description: GateKeeper is a fast alignment filter for DNA short read mapping, designed to quickly reject dissimilar sequences before expensive alignment steps, often utilizing FPGA acceleration.

tools.name: bamql
tools.one_line_profile: Query language for filtering SAM/BAM reads
tools.detailed_description: BamQL provides a query language syntax for filtering reads in SAM/BAM files, allowing for complex selection criteria beyond standard flag filtering.

tools.name: SanitizeMe
tools.one_line_profile: Host contaminant removal tool for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by CDC to remove host contaminants from sequencing files, ensuring privacy and data cleanliness for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SneakySnake
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware-efficient pre-alignment filtering algorithm
tools.detailed_description: SneakySnake is a pre-alignment filtering algorithm that works efficiently on CPU, FPGA, and GPU architectures to expedite sequence alignment calculation for both short and long reads.

tools.name: CebolaLab/RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Step-by-step analysis pipeline for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based analysis pipeline for RNA-seq data processing, covering steps from raw reads to expression quantification.

tools.name: fadapa
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for FastQC output data
tools.detailed_description: FAstqc DAta PArser (fadapa) is a minimal Python library to parse FastQC output data into a structured format for programmatic access.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers
tools.detailed_description: Accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI). Heavily optimized for scalability and speed.

tools.name: TrimGalore
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Cutadapt and FastQC for consistent trimming
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files, with extra functionality for RRBS data.

tools.name: sra-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to download and process SRA files
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to download sra files from SRA, pipe through fastq_dump and bowtie2, designed for containerized execution.

tools.name: toulligQC
tools.one_line_profile: Post-sequencing QC tool for Oxford Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A post sequencing QC tool specifically designed for Oxford Nanopore sequencers to evaluate run quality and read statistics.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Drop-Seq scRNA-seq preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A SingleCell RNASeq pre-processing snakemake workflow, specifically tailored for Drop-Seq data analysis.

tools.name: TGSFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast filtering and trimming tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: TGSFilter is an efficient tool designed for the filtering and trimming of Third Generation Sequencing (long read) data.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast molecular property prediction library
tools.detailed_description: Fast Molecular Property Prediction using mordredcommunity descriptors, designed for cheminformatics and materials science applications.

tools.name: AliNe
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow alignment pipeline from FASTQ to BAM
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow Alignment Pipeline that processes raw fastq.gz files into sorted BAM files, streamlining the alignment workflow.

tools.name: vtkToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for VTK scientific visualization
tools.detailed_description: A MEX interface to the VTK library, providing MATLAB functions to read/write VTK files and apply VTK filters for scientific visualization and data processing.

tools.name: FastqCLS
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based reordering compressor for FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: A robust FASTQ-specific compressor for recent generation sequencing data that utilizes score-based reordering to improve compression ratios.

tools.name: Natrix
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for raw sequencing data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: An open-source bioinformatics pipeline designed for the preprocessing of raw sequencing data, including quality control and filtering steps.

tools.name: DAmar
tools.one_line_profile: Long read QC, assembly and scaffolding pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Quality Control, assembly, and scaffolding of long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: FastProNGS
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for FASTQ QC, trimming, and statistics
tools.detailed_description: A tool used to cut adapter, perform quality control, trimming, splitting, and statistics generation for fastq data.

tools.name: Ktrim
tools.one_line_profile: Extra-fast and accurate adapter and quality trimmer for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Ktrim is a lightweight and efficient tool designed for the quality control of high-throughput sequencing data. It performs adapter trimming and quality filtering with high speed and accuracy, suitable for preprocessing raw reads before downstream analysis.

tools.name: HoCoRT
tools.one_line_profile: Host Contamination Removal Tool for sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: HoCoRT (Host Contamination Removal Tool) is a pipeline designed to efficiently remove specific organism sequences (such as host contamination) from sequencing reads. It utilizes fast alignment tools like Bowtie2 and Hisat2 to filter out unwanted reads while preserving the target microbial data.

tools.name: AlignQC
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and quality control tool for long read alignments
tools.detailed_description: AlignQC is a tool for analyzing long-read sequencing alignments. It generates comprehensive reports on mappability, error patterns, and read characteristics from BAM files, outputting XHTML reports for visualization and quality assessment of long-read data.

tools.name: eASV-pipeline-for-515Y-926R
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing mixed 16S/18S amplicon sequences
tools.detailed_description: This pipeline is designed for the analysis of mixed 16S and 18S amplicon sequences, specifically targeting the 515Y-926R primer set. It integrates tools like QIIME2, DADA2, and Deblur to perform quality control, denoising, and taxonomic classification for microbial ecology studies.

tools.name: needLR
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant filtering and prioritization for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: needLR is a tool for filtering and prioritizing structural variants (SVs) detected in long-read sequencing data. It helps in reducing false positives and identifying high-confidence SVs for downstream genomic analysis.

tools.name: TaxTriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for agnostic identification and classification of microbial organisms
tools.detailed_description: TaxTriage is a flexible Nextflow workflow designed for the agnostic identification and classification of microbial organisms from both short-read and long-read metagenomic NGS data. It facilitates rapid triage and analysis of metagenomic samples.

tools.name: fastqcr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for quality control of sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: fastqcr is an R package that facilitates the quality control of sequencing data. It allows users to run FastQC from within R, aggregate the results, and generate summary reports, streamlining the QC process for large datasets.

tools.name: FastQt
tools.one_line_profile: FastQC port to Qt5 for high throughput sequence data quality control
tools.detailed_description: FastQt is a graphical user interface tool for quality control of high-throughput sequencing data, ported from FastQC to the Qt5 framework. It provides an interactive environment for visualizing and assessing the quality of sequencing reads.

tools.name: FastqCleaner
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny application for quality control, filtering, and trimming of FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: FastqCleaner is a Bioconductor package providing a Shiny web application and R functions for the quality control, filtering, and trimming of FASTQ files. It offers a user-friendly interface for preprocessing sequencing data.

tools.name: trimadap
tools.one_line_profile: Fast but inaccurate adapter trimmer for Illumina reads
tools.detailed_description: trimadap is a lightweight C tool developed by Heng Li for removing adapter sequences from Illumina sequencing reads. It prioritizes speed and is designed for specific use cases where heuristic trimming is sufficient.

tools.name: primer-trimming
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C code for identifying and removing primers and adapters
tools.detailed_description: primer-trimming is a fast C-based utility for identifying and removing primer and adapter sequences from sequencing data. It is designed for efficient preprocessing of reads in metagenomic and genomic workflows.

tools.name: Cutadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to remove adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other unwanted sequence from high-throughput sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing reads. It is one of the most widely used tools for cleaning NGS data before alignment or assembly.

tools.name: slide_snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for spatial transcriptomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: slide_snake is a Snakemake pipeline designed for the preprocessing, alignment, quality control, and quantification of spatial transcriptomics data. It supports both short-read and long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: Metagenomics-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable, data-agnostic workflow for short and long metagenomic read analysis
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow that automates the analysis of short and long metagenomic reads obtained from Illumina or Oxford Nanopore Technology devices. It handles quality control, assembly, and other downstream tasks in a reproducible manner.

tools.name: ChIPSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing script for ChIP-Seq data from FASTQ to peaks
tools.detailed_description: A script for full processing of ChIP-Seq data starting from fastq files. It performs FastQC quality control, mapping to human or mouse genomes using BWA, SAM/BAM conversion, peak calling with MACS, and BigWig generation.

tools.name: rnaSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing script for RNA-Seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A script for full processing of RNA-Seq data starting from fastq files. It integrates FastQC, STAR mapping, featureCounts, and DESeq2 for differential expression analysis and visualization.

tools.name: Ancient_mtDNA_Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing ancient mitochondrial DNA paired-end reads
tools.detailed_description: Analysis pipeline designed for processing paired-end Illumina reads obtained after ancient mtDNA target enrichment capture, handling the specific characteristics of ancient DNA damage and processing.

tools.name: TidyMultiqc
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for MultiQC reports into Tidy data frames
tools.detailed_description: A utility that converts 'MultiQC' reports into Tidy data frames, facilitating downstream statistical analysis and visualization of quality control metrics within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: nf-cmgg/preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Sequencing data preprocessing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow for the preprocessing of sequencing data, likely including quality control and trimming steps tailored for CMGG facilities.

tools.name: nf-core/bamtofastq
tools.one_line_profile: BAM/CRAM to FASTQ conversion and QC pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that converts BAM or CRAM files to FASTQ format and performs quality control checks, useful for reverting aligned data to raw reads for re-analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/detaxizer
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and filtering (host removal)
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and optionally remove certain sequences (taxa) from raw genomic data, such as removing human host reads from metagenomic samples.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for investigating horizontal gene transfer from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline to detect and investigate horizontal gene transfer events using Next Generation Sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/seqinspector
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive QC-only pipeline for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated pipeline for running a large set of quality control tools on sequencing data, generating global and group-specific MultiQC reports, targeting core facilities or high-throughput groups.

tools.name: autoadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic quality control and adapter trimming for FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic quality control of FASTQ sequencing files, likely handling adapter detection and trimming.

tools.name: mpox-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Monkeypox virus assembly and host-removal pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Monkeypox virus (MPXV) assembly, including host-removal, reference-based assembly, and generation of sequence quality metrics for Illumina paired-end shotgun metagenomic data.

tools.name: fqc
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible quality control dashboard for FASTQ assessment
tools.detailed_description: A quality control dashboard built around FASTQ assessment, providing visualization of sequencing data quality metrics.

tools.name: clean
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for decontamination of short reads, long reads and contigs
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the decontamination of sequencing data, supporting short reads, long reads, and contigs, suitable for removing host or contaminant sequences.

tools.name: fastq.bio
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web tool for DNA sequencing quality control
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web-based tool for performing quality control on DNA sequencing data (FASTQ files), utilizing WebAssembly for client-side processing.

tools.name: fastq.bio-serverless
tools.one_line_profile: Serverless version of fastq.bio for sequencing QC
tools.detailed_description: A serverless implementation of the fastq.bio tool, using Cloudflare workers and WebAssembly to perform quality control on DNA sequencing data.

tools.name: minion_multiQC
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-tool QC wrapper for MinION data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to aggregate quality control metrics for Oxford Nanopore MinION data, likely integrating with MultiQC.

tools.name: Filtlong
tools.one_line_profile: Quality filtering tool for long reads (Nanopore/PacBio)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering long reads (e.g., Oxford Nanopore, PacBio) by quality, length, and other metrics to improve downstream assembly or analysis.

tools.name: Porechop
tools.one_line_profile: Adapter trimmer for Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for finding and removing adapters from Oxford Nanopore reads. Adapters on the ends of reads are trimmed, and when a read has an adapter in its middle, it is treated as a chimera and chopped into separate reads.

tools.name: FastQC
tools.one_line_profile: Standard quality control tool for high throughput sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A quality control analysis tool which provides a modular set of analyses which you can use to give a quick impression of whether your data has any problems of which you should be aware before doing any further analysis.

tools.name: chopper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for partitioning biological sequences into similar batches
tools.detailed_description: A tool part of the SeqAn ecosystem for partitioning a set of sequences into batches (bins) that are similar in terms of their k-mer content, useful for parallel processing or indexing.

tools.name: sequana_fastqc
tools.one_line_profile: Sequana pipeline for parallel FastQC and MultiQC summary
tools.detailed_description: A Sequana pipeline that runs FastQC in parallel on multiple samples and summarizes the results using MultiQC, streamlining the QC process.

tools.name: NxTrim
tools.one_line_profile: Adapter trimming for Illumina Nextera Mate Pair libraries
tools.detailed_description: A tool for adapter trimming and virtual library creation specifically for Illumina Nextera Mate Pair libraries, separating true mate pairs from paired-end reads.

tools.name: FastPCC
tools.one_line_profile: Fast calculation of interstation correlations for seismic noise
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compute interstation correlations of seismic ambient noise, including fast implementations of standard, 1-bit, phase, and wavelet phase cross-correlations.

tools.name: Trimmomatic-pigz
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated version of Trimmomatic using pigz
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the official Trimmomatic tool that utilizes pigz for parallel gzip compression/decompression, offering significantly faster processing speeds with identical results.

tools.name: falco
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C++ replacement for FastQC
tools.detailed_description: A C++ drop-in replacement for FastQC to assess the quality of sequence read data, offering faster performance while producing compatible reports.
